Sentencas: The oxygen adsorption on Ag/LSM(0 01) catalysts surfaces has been investigated using first-principles density functional theory calculations.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The most favorable oxygen adsorption sites are found to be atop surface Mn atoms on the MnO2-terminated surface and on the hollow positions of the La(Sr)O-terminated LSM(0 01) surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The calculated adsorption energies for Ag atom demonstrate that the Ag adsorption at O site is much more favorable than Mn site.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The atomic relaxation results indicate that Ag doping produces a strong local perturbation and a large effect on the surface properties.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: No significant improvement for oxygen adsorption is found due to Ag doping.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: However, the O-2 adsorption energy increases from 0.495 eV to 0.937 eV due to the pre-adsorbed Ag.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: It is pre-adsorbed Ag that facilitates O-2 adsorption on surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The bond length and bond population of O-2 molecule indicate that Ag atom facilitates O-2 molecule dissociative adsorption.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study

Sentencas: The adsorbed Ag on LSM strengthens its activity as SOFCs cathode by acting as an active center at the surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption on the Ag/La1-xSrxMnO3(001) catalysts surfaces: A first-principles study
